about_the_game:
Forbidden Tapes is a game consisting of three different horror stories. In the first episode, discover Jeremy Winterroad's recording, an urban exploration enthusiast searching for abandoned places full of stories. He won't be disappointed when he explores the old McNale house.


  • Evolve in a disturbing environment
In the first episode of Forbidden Tapes, explore the abandoned McNale house and its surroundings in a dark and deteriorated environment. Discover clues as you progress to understand what really happened, all in an increasingly oppressive and anxious atmosphere.

  • Key features
Each story will unfold through the typical aesthetic of a VHS in a photo-realistic setting, accompanied by a pervasive and immersive sound atmosphere.

  • The Easter Egg hunt is open
Each of the three stories will have its share of Easter Eggs to discover. You can make it your secondary objective to find them all or simply stumble upon them by chance during your adventure.
